subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Gomez, who missed 17 of Houston’s last 20 games with an injury, homered off Masahiro Tanaka on the first pitch of the fourth to put the Yankees in a hole they never escaped.
snippet: Gomez, who missed 17 of Houston’s last 20 games with an injury, homered off Masahiro Tanaka on the first pitch of the fourth to put the Yankees in a hole they never escaped.
